did.abstract: Law student at the University of Michigan. Notes on the law lectures of Victor H. Lane relating in part to extraordinary legal remedies.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Evans Holbrook Student Notebook, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Law student at the University of Michigan and later law professor.

scopecontent.p: The Evans Holbrook collection consists of a single volume of his notes on the law lectures of Victor H. Lane relating in part to extraordinary legal remedies
